threads.name: OAuth login not working after update
messages: After the latest update, OAuth login stopped working for our users. They click the 'Sign in with Google' button but get redirected back to the login page without any error message.
We're using the standard OAuth 2.0 flow with Google as the provider. This was working fine until yesterday.
Can you check if there were any changes to the OAuth callback URL handling?

threads.name: SAML SSO configuration issues
messages: We're trying to set up SAML SSO with Okta but the configuration isn't working. Users get a 'Invalid SAML response' error when trying to log in.
We've followed the documentation but something seems wrong with the assertion consumer service URL.
Our IT team needs this working by end of week for compliance.

threads.name: Sessions expiring too quickly
messages: Our users are complaining that their sessions expire after just 15 minutes of inactivity. This is causing them to lose work.
Is there a way to extend the session timeout? We'd prefer at least 2 hours.
Also, can we implement a 'remember me' option for trusted devices?

threads.name: Webhooks not firing for new events
messages: We set up a webhook endpoint to receive notifications when new tickets are created, but we're not receiving any requests.
The webhook URL is correct and accessible. We've tested it with curl and it responds fine.
Can you check if webhooks are being queued properly on your end?

threads.name: Webhook payload missing fields
messages: The webhook payloads we're receiving don't include the custom fields we added to our tickets.
According to the docs, custom fields should be included in the payload. Is this a bug or do we need to enable something?
We need these fields for our internal automation workflows.

threads.name: API rate limit exceeded errors
messages: We're getting 429 Too Many Requests errors when syncing data. Our integration makes about 100 requests per minute.
Is there a way to increase our rate limit? We're on the Pro plan.
What's the recommended approach for handling rate limits in bulk operations?

threads.name: API key not working for certain endpoints
messages: We created an API key but it returns 403 Forbidden when trying to access the /users endpoint.
The key works fine for other endpoints like /tickets and /messages.
How do we grant the necessary permissions to the API key?

threads.name: Dashboard stuck on loading spinner
messages: The main dashboard page is stuck on a loading spinner. It's been like this for over an hour.
Other pages seem to work fine. We've tried clearing cache and different browsers.
This is affecting our entire team - nobody can see the dashboard.

threads.name: Search filters returning wrong results
messages: When I filter tickets by 'status: open', I'm also seeing closed tickets in the results.
This started happening after the UI update last week.
The date range filters also seem broken - they're not respecting the selected dates.

threads.name: CSV export generating corrupt files
messages: The CSV export feature is generating files that can't be opened in Excel. They appear to be corrupted.
We need to export our ticket data for a quarterly report. This is urgent.
The export worked fine last month with the same data.

threads.name: Bulk data import failing silently
messages: We're trying to import 5000 contacts from a CSV file but only about 2000 are showing up.
There's no error message - the import just says 'completed' but the numbers don't match.
Can you check if there are validation errors we're not seeing?

threads.name: Charged twice for subscription
messages: We were charged twice this month for our Team plan subscription. Please refund the duplicate charge.
Invoice numbers: INV-2024-1234 and INV-2024-1235 for the same amount.
This happened when we tried to update our payment method.

threads.name: Questions about Enterprise plan
messages: We're considering upgrading to the Enterprise plan. Can you tell us more about the additional features?
Specifically interested in: SSO support, custom SLAs, and dedicated support.
We have about 50 users and process around 1000 tickets per month.

threads.name: Cannot find invoice for tax purposes
messages: I need the invoice from October 2023 for our tax filing but I can't find it in the billing portal.
The oldest invoice I can see is from January 2024.
Can you send me a copy or restore access to older invoices?

threads.name: Search queries taking too long
messages: Search queries are taking 10-15 seconds to return results. This used to be instant.
We have about 50,000 tickets in our workspace. Is this expected?
The slowdown started about a week ago. Any known issues?

threads.name: Frequent timeout errors on reports
messages: Running the monthly analytics report always times out before completing.
We've tried running it at different times of day but same result.
Is there a way to optimize the report or run it in the background?

threads.name: Team member can't see certain tickets
messages: We added a new team member but they can't see tickets assigned to the 'Sales' group.
I've checked their role and it should have access to all groups.
Other team members with the same role can see those tickets.

threads.name: How to share custom dashboard with team
messages: I created a custom dashboard with our KPIs but I don't see how to share it with my team.
Is dashboard sharing a feature? If so, where do I find it?
We need to present these metrics in our weekly standup.

threads.name: Mobile app crashing on startup
messages: The iOS mobile app crashes immediately after the splash screen. Started happening after the latest update.
I've tried reinstalling but same issue. iPhone 14 Pro, iOS 17.2.
The Android version works fine for our team.

threads.name: Email notifications going to spam folder
messages: All notification emails from your service are going to our spam folder in Gmail.
We've added your domain to our safe senders list but it's not helping.
Can you check your email authentication settings? SPF/DKIM?

threads.name: Slack integration stopped syncing messages
messages: Our Slack integration was working fine until yesterday. Now new messages from Slack aren't appearing in tickets.
We've tried disconnecting and reconnecting the integration but it didn't help.
The connection status shows as 'active' but no messages are coming through.

threads.name: GitHub webhook creating duplicate tickets
messages: Every time a GitHub issue is created, we're getting two tickets instead of one.
This started after we updated the GitHub integration settings.
Can you check if there are duplicate webhook subscriptions?

threads.name: Discord bot not responding to commands
messages: Our Discord bot stopped responding to slash commands. It was working fine last week.
The bot is still online and shows as connected, but commands don't trigger any actions.
We've checked permissions and everything looks correct.

threads.name: Custom field validation rejecting valid data
messages: We created a custom 'Priority' field with options: Low, Medium, High. But when we try to set it to 'High', we get a validation error.
The error says 'Invalid value' but 'High' is definitely one of the allowed options.
This is blocking our workflow automation.

threads.name: Automation workflow not running on ticket creation
messages: We set up an automation to assign tickets to a specific team based on keywords, but it's not working.
The workflow is enabled and the conditions look correct. We've tested with tickets that should match.
Is there a delay or are workflows processed in batches?

threads.name: Workflow conditions not working as expected
messages: We have a workflow with multiple conditions (AND/OR logic) but it's not matching tickets correctly.
The condition is: 'Status is Open AND Priority is High OR Label contains urgent'.
It's matching tickets that shouldn't match. Can you clarify how the logic is evaluated?

threads.name: Custom date range not working in reports
messages: When I try to generate a report with a custom date range (last 90 days), it only shows data from the last 30 days.
The date picker shows the correct range but the report data doesn't match.
This is affecting our monthly analytics.

threads.name: PDF export of reports generating blank pages
messages: When we export reports to PDF, the first page is blank and the data starts on page 2.
This happens with all report types, not just one specific report.
We need PDF exports for client presentations.

threads.name: Analytics dashboard missing key metrics
messages: The analytics dashboard doesn't show average response time or resolution time metrics.
These are critical KPIs for our team. Are they available in a different view?
We're on the Pro plan - is this a feature limitation?

threads.name: Two-factor authentication not being enforced
messages: We enabled 2FA for all team members but some users can still log in without it.
The security settings show 2FA as 'required' but it's not actually blocking logins.
This is a security concern for our compliance requirements.

threads.name: IP whitelist not blocking unauthorized access
messages: We configured an IP whitelist for our workspace but users from outside the whitelist can still access it.
The whitelist is enabled and contains our office IP ranges.
Are there any exceptions or bypass mechanisms we should know about?

threads.name: New users not receiving welcome emails
messages: When we invite new team members, they're not receiving the welcome email with setup instructions.
Other notification emails are working fine, just the welcome email is missing.
Can we customize the welcome email template?

threads.name: Onboarding tutorial not appearing for new users
messages: New team members should see an interactive tutorial when they first log in, but it's not showing up.
We've checked the settings and tutorials are enabled.
Is there a way to manually trigger the tutorial for existing users?

threads.name: Custom logo upload failing
messages: We're trying to upload our company logo for custom branding but the upload keeps failing.
The file is a PNG, 500x200px, under 1MB. We get an error saying 'Upload failed' with no details.
Is there a specific format or size requirement we're missing?

threads.name: Custom theme colors not saving
messages: We customized the theme colors in settings but they're not applying to the interface.
The colors save successfully but the UI still shows the default theme.
We've tried logging out and back in, clearing cache, different browsers.

threads.name: Ticket templates not supporting all variables
messages: We created ticket templates but they don't support variables like {{customer_name}} or {{ticket_id}}.
The documentation mentions template variables but we can't find where to use them.
This would save us a lot of time in our support workflow.

threads.name: How to merge duplicate tickets
messages: We have several duplicate tickets that were created for the same issue. Is there a way to merge them?
We can't find a merge option in the ticket actions menu.
This would help us keep our ticket history clean.

threads.name: Tickets auto-reassigning when assignee is away
messages: When a team member is marked as 'away' or 'on vacation', their tickets are being automatically reassigned.
We don't want this behavior - we prefer to manually reassign tickets.
Can we disable the auto-reassignment feature?

threads.name: SLA breach notifications not being sent
messages: We configured SLA rules with breach notifications, but we're not receiving alerts when SLAs are about to be breached.
The SLA rules are active and tickets are approaching their deadlines.
Are notifications sent via email or in-app? We're not seeing either.

threads.name: SLA calculation including weekends
messages: Our SLA is set to 24 business hours, but the system is counting weekends and holidays.
We've configured business hours as Monday-Friday 9am-5pm, but it's not being respected.
This is causing false SLA breaches.

threads.name: Cannot attach files larger than 10MB
messages: We're trying to attach a 15MB log file to a ticket comment but it's being rejected.
The error says 'File too large' but doesn't tell us the size limit.
Can we increase the attachment size limit? We often need to share large diagnostic files.

threads.name: Rich text formatting not working in comments
messages: When we try to format text in ticket comments (bold, lists, code blocks), the formatting doesn't apply.
The formatting toolbar is visible but clicking buttons doesn't do anything.
This worked fine before the last update.

threads.name: Mentioning team members not sending notifications
messages: When we @mention team members in comments, they're not receiving notifications.
We've checked notification settings and mentions are enabled.
Other comment notifications work fine, just mentions are broken.

threads.name: Full-text search not finding tickets by content
messages: When we search for text that we know exists in ticket messages, the search returns no results.
The search seems to only work on ticket titles, not message content.
We have thousands of tickets and need to search through message history.

threads.name: Saved search filters disappearing
messages: We created several saved search filters but they keep disappearing after a few days.
The filters work fine when we create them, but then they're gone when we come back.
Is there a limit on saved filters or are they expiring?

threads.name: Search autocomplete showing irrelevant suggestions
messages: The search autocomplete is suggesting tickets and terms that are completely unrelated to what we're typing.
It's making it harder to find what we're looking for.
Can we customize or improve the search suggestions?

threads.name: Mobile app not receiving push notifications
messages: We have push notifications enabled in the mobile app settings, but we're not receiving any.
Email notifications work fine, just push notifications are missing.
We've checked device settings and app permissions - everything looks correct.

threads.name: Mobile app offline changes not syncing
messages: When we make changes to tickets while offline on mobile, they don't sync when we come back online.
The app shows 'syncing' but the changes never appear on the web version.
We've lost several ticket updates this way.

threads.name: Mobile app dark mode causing display issues
messages: When we enable dark mode on the mobile app, text becomes unreadable in some views.
The contrast is too low - white text on light gray backgrounds.
This is on both iOS and Android versions.

threads.name: Inbound emails not creating tickets correctly
messages: When customers reply to support emails, the replies aren't being parsed correctly into ticket threads.
Some replies create new tickets instead of adding to existing ones.
The email threading logic seems broken.

threads.name: Email signatures being included in ticket messages
messages: When emails are converted to tickets, the entire email signature is being included in the message body.
This makes tickets messy and harder to read.
Can the system automatically strip email signatures?

threads.name: Auto-responder not sending confirmation emails
messages: We configured an auto-responder to send confirmation emails when tickets are created, but it's not working.
The auto-responder is enabled and the template looks correct.
We've tested with new tickets but no confirmation emails are being sent.

threads.name: Team roles and permissions confusing
messages: We're having trouble understanding the difference between 'Admin', 'Manager', and 'Agent' roles.
The permissions documentation isn't clear about what each role can do.
Can you provide a comparison table or clearer documentation?

threads.name: Bulk user import failing with validation errors
messages: We're trying to import 200 users from a CSV file but getting validation errors.
The error messages aren't clear about which rows have problems.
Can you improve the error reporting to show which specific users failed and why?

threads.name: What happens to tickets when user is deactivated
messages: We need to deactivate a team member who's leaving. What happens to their assigned tickets?
Will the tickets be automatically reassigned or will they remain assigned to the deactivated user?
We want to make sure nothing gets lost in the transition.

threads.name: Zapier integration timing out on large payloads
messages: Our Zapier integration works fine for small tickets, but times out when processing tickets with many comments or attachments.
The timeout happens after 30 seconds. Can we increase this limit?
We're using Zapier to sync tickets with our CRM.

threads.name: Jira integration only syncing one direction
messages: We set up Jira integration to sync tickets bidirectionally, but changes in Jira aren't appearing in our system.
Changes from our system to Jira work fine, but not the other way.
The sync settings show bidirectional sync is enabled.

threads.name: Salesforce integration field mapping issues
messages: We're trying to map custom fields between our system and Salesforce, but some fields aren't available in the mapping options.
The fields exist in both systems but don't show up in the integration settings.
We need these custom fields for our sales process.

threads.name: API pagination returning inconsistent page sizes
messages: When we paginate through API results, some pages return 25 items, others return 50, even though we set page_size=25.
This is breaking our pagination logic. The total count also seems incorrect.
We're using the REST API v2.

threads.name: Bulk operations API limited to 100 items
messages: The bulk operations API only allows updating 100 items at a time, which is too slow for our use case.
We need to update thousands of tickets in bulk. Can we increase this limit?
Or is there a better approach for bulk updates?

threads.name: Webhook retry policy not clear
messages: When our webhook endpoint is temporarily down, we want to know how many times and how often retries will be attempted.
The documentation doesn't explain the retry policy clearly.
We need this information to plan our webhook endpoint reliability.

threads.name: Keyboard shortcuts not working
messages: The keyboard shortcuts listed in the help menu don't seem to work.
We've tried Cmd+K for search, Cmd+N for new ticket, etc. but nothing happens.
Are keyboard shortcuts enabled by default or do we need to enable them somewhere?

threads.name: Web interface not responsive on mobile browsers
messages: When we access the web interface on mobile browsers, the layout is broken and unusable.
Tables overflow, buttons are too small to tap, and forms are hard to fill out.
We know there's a mobile app, but some team members prefer the web interface.

threads.name: Screen reader not announcing important updates
messages: Our team member who uses a screen reader says that important UI updates aren't being announced.
For example, when a ticket status changes or new messages arrive, there's no announcement.
Can you improve the ARIA labels and live regions for better accessibility?

threads.name: Data backup export format not documented
messages: We want to export all our data as a backup, but we're not sure what format it will be in or how to restore it.
The export option exists but there's no documentation about the format or restoration process.
This is important for our disaster recovery planning.

threads.name: GDPR deletion request - how to delete customer data
messages: A customer has requested deletion of their data under GDPR. How do we completely remove all their information?
We need to delete tickets, messages, and any associated data.
Is there a bulk deletion feature or do we need to do this manually?

threads.name: Audit log missing some important events
messages: We're reviewing the audit log but it doesn't show when team members viewed tickets or accessed certain data.
We need comprehensive audit logs for compliance purposes.
Can you add more events to the audit log?

threads.name: Dashboard taking 30+ seconds to load
messages: The main dashboard takes over 30 seconds to load, even with a fast internet connection.
We've tried different browsers and cleared cache, but the issue persists.
This is significantly impacting our team's productivity.

threads.name: Bulk actions taking too long to complete
messages: When we try to bulk update 50+ tickets (like changing status or assigning), it takes several minutes.
The operation seems to process tickets one by one instead of in parallel.
Can you optimize bulk operations for better performance?

threads.name: Real-time updates lagging behind
messages: When team members are working on the same ticket, updates from others appear with a 10-15 second delay.
This causes confusion and duplicate work.
The real-time sync used to be instant - what changed?

threads.name: Payment method expired but subscription still active
messages: Our credit card expired last month but our subscription is still active and we haven't been charged.
We updated the payment method but are concerned about the billing gap.
Will we be charged retroactively or is there a grace period?

threads.name: Questions about usage-based pricing model
messages: We're considering switching to usage-based pricing. How does it work?
What counts as usage - ticket volume, API calls, storage?
Can we set spending limits or alerts to avoid surprise bills?

threads.name: Invoice tax calculation seems incorrect
messages: The tax amount on our latest invoice doesn't match our calculations.
We're in California and the tax rate should be 8.5%, but the invoice shows a different amount.
Can you verify the tax calculation or provide a breakdown?

threads.name: Request: Custom workflow builder with visual editor
messages: We'd love to have a visual workflow builder where we can drag and drop actions and conditions.
The current automation system is too limited for our complex workflows.
This would be a game-changer for our support operations.

threads.name: Request: AI-powered ticket response suggestions
messages: It would be great if the system could suggest responses based on similar past tickets.
This would help our team respond faster and more consistently.
Is this feature on the roadmap?

threads.name: Request: Multi-language support interface
messages: Our team works in multiple languages. Can you add support for Spanish, French, and German interfaces?
We'd also like ticket content to be translatable.
This would help us serve our international customers better.

threads.name: Request: Built-in video call support
messages: We'd like to be able to start video calls directly from tickets to help customers in real-time.
This would eliminate the need to switch to Zoom or Teams.
Is this something you're planning to add?

threads.name: Duplicate ticket detection not working
messages: The system should detect duplicate tickets but it's not catching obvious duplicates.
We're getting multiple tickets for the same issue from the same customer.
Can you improve the duplicate detection algorithm?

threads.name: Image attachment previews not loading
messages: When we attach images to tickets, the preview thumbnails don't load - just showing broken image icons.
Clicking to view the full image works, but the previews are broken.
This makes it harder to quickly identify what's in attachments.

threads.name: Ticket timestamps showing wrong timezone
messages: All ticket timestamps are showing in UTC instead of our configured timezone (EST).
We've set the timezone in our workspace settings but it's not being applied.
This is confusing for our team and customers.

threads.name: Desktop notification sound not playing
messages: We have desktop notifications enabled with sound, but the sound never plays.
The notifications appear visually, but there's no audio alert.
We've checked browser permissions and system volume - everything seems correct.

threads.name: API documentation missing recent endpoints
messages: The API documentation doesn't include several endpoints that we discovered through trial and error.
Specifically, the bulk update and webhook management endpoints aren't documented.
Can you update the documentation to include all available endpoints?

threads.name: Planning migration from Zendesk - need guidance
messages: We're planning to migrate from Zendesk and need help understanding the migration process.
We have about 10,000 tickets, 500 contacts, and custom fields to migrate.
Do you offer migration assistance or tools to help with this?

threads.name: Request for team training resources
messages: We're onboarding 20 new team members and would like training materials or sessions.
Do you offer training webinars, video tutorials, or documentation for new users?
We want to make sure our team uses the platform effectively.

threads.name: Microsoft Teams integration setup help
messages: We're trying to set up the Microsoft Teams integration but running into issues with authentication.
The OAuth flow keeps failing at the consent screen.
Can you provide step-by-step setup instructions or help troubleshoot?

threads.name: PagerDuty integration not routing alerts correctly
messages: We connected PagerDuty to route critical tickets, but alerts are going to the wrong on-call rotation.
The integration settings show the correct service, but alerts aren't matching.
This is urgent - we're missing critical alerts.

threads.name: Intercom integration has 5-minute sync delay
messages: Messages between Intercom and our system have a 5-minute delay, which is too slow for real-time support.
We need near-instant sync for our customer conversations.
Is this delay configurable or can it be reduced?

threads.name: Dropdown custom field limited to 50 options
messages: We created a dropdown custom field but hit a limit of 50 options.
We need at least 200 options for our product catalog field.
Can you increase this limit or suggest an alternative approach?

threads.name: Request: Conditional custom field display
messages: We want to show/hide custom fields based on other field values.
For example, show 'Priority' field only when 'Type' is set to 'Bug'.
This would make our ticket forms cleaner and more relevant.

threads.name: Request: Scheduled actions in workflows
messages: We'd like to add scheduled actions to workflows, like 'send reminder email after 3 days if ticket is still open'.
Currently, workflows only trigger on events, not on schedules.
This would help us automate follow-ups and escalations.

threads.name: Workflow webhook actions failing silently
messages: We have workflows that call external webhooks, but when the webhook fails, there's no notification or retry.
We only discover the failures days later when checking logs.
Can you add error notifications and retry logic for failed webhook actions?

threads.name: Request: Custom chart types in reports
messages: The built-in report charts are limited. We'd like to create custom chart types like heatmaps and funnel charts.
We need more visualization options for our analytics presentations.
Is this possible or on the roadmap?

threads.name: Scheduled report delivery not working
messages: We set up weekly report delivery via email, but we're not receiving the reports.
The schedule shows as active, but no emails have been sent in the past 3 weeks.
Can you check if there's an issue with the scheduled delivery system?

threads.name: Request: Cohort analysis in analytics
messages: We'd like to see cohort analysis to understand customer retention and ticket patterns over time.
This would help us identify trends and improve our support strategy.
Is cohort analysis available or planned?

threads.name: Session timeout too short for security compliance
messages: Our security policy requires 8-hour session timeouts, but the maximum allowed is 4 hours.
We need longer sessions for compliance with our internal security standards.
Can you increase the maximum session timeout duration?

threads.name: Password policy not strong enough
messages: The current password policy allows weak passwords. We need to enforce stronger requirements.
We want: minimum 16 characters, require special characters, and prevent common passwords.
Can we customize the password policy?

threads.name: Request: Customizable onboarding checklist
messages: We'd like to customize the onboarding checklist for new team members with our specific setup steps.
The current checklist is generic and doesn't match our workflow.
This would help new hires get up to speed faster.

threads.name: Email templates not using custom branding
messages: We customized our branding (logo, colors) but email templates still use the default branding.
Customer-facing emails should match our brand identity.
Can you ensure email templates respect custom branding settings?

threads.name: Request: Bulk tag management for tickets
messages: We need to add or remove tags from multiple tickets at once.
Currently, we have to edit each ticket individually, which is very time-consuming.
Can you add bulk tag operations?

threads.name: Ticket watchers receiving too many notifications
messages: When we add watchers to tickets, they get notified for every single update, which is overwhelming.
We'd like to configure notification preferences for watchers (e.g., only on status changes).
Can you add notification settings for watchers?

threads.name: Request: Edit history for comments
messages: When team members edit comments, we'd like to see the edit history to track changes.
This would help with accountability and understanding what was changed.
Is comment edit history available?

threads.name: Request: Advanced search operators
messages: We'd like to use advanced search operators like 'AND', 'OR', 'NOT', and parentheses for complex queries.
The current search is too basic for our needs.
Can you add support for boolean search operators?

threads.name: Request: Better tablet optimization
messages: The mobile app works well on phones but isn't optimized for tablets.
On iPad, the interface looks stretched and doesn't take advantage of the larger screen.
Can you create a tablet-optimized layout?

threads.name: Email threading breaking with forwarded emails
messages: When customers forward email conversations, the threading breaks and creates separate ticket threads.
This fragments the conversation history and makes it hard to follow.
Can you improve email threading to handle forwarded messages?

threads.name: Request: Team organization hierarchy
messages: We'd like to organize teams in a hierarchy (departments > teams > agents).
Currently, teams are flat which doesn't match our organizational structure.
This would help with reporting and permissions management.

threads.name: HubSpot integration not syncing contact updates
messages: Our HubSpot integration syncs tickets to HubSpot, but contact information updates in HubSpot aren't syncing back.
We need bidirectional contact sync to keep data in sync.
Is bidirectional contact sync supported?

threads.name: API rate limit headers not included in responses
messages: API responses don't include rate limit headers (X-RateLimit-Limit, X-RateLimit-Remaining, etc.).
This makes it hard to implement proper rate limit handling in our integration.
Can you add standard rate limit headers to API responses?

threads.name: Dark mode has poor contrast ratios
messages: Dark mode doesn't meet WCAG contrast requirements - text is hard to read.
The gray text on dark backgrounds has insufficient contrast.
Can you improve the color scheme to meet accessibility standards?

threads.name: Data export missing some ticket fields
messages: When we export all tickets, some custom fields and internal notes are missing from the export.
The export should include all ticket data, not just a subset.
We need complete data exports for compliance and backup purposes.

threads.name: Caching causing stale data display
messages: The interface is showing stale data - ticket statuses and counts are outdated.
We have to refresh multiple times to see current data.
The caching seems too aggressive. Can we reduce cache duration or add a manual refresh option?

threads.name: Questions about annual billing discount
messages: We're considering switching to annual billing. What's the discount percentage?
Can we prorate the current month if we switch mid-cycle?
Do we get the discount immediately or at renewal?

testCases.description: OAuth login issues should match other authentication problems
Webhook issues should match other API/integration problems
Billing issues should match other payment/subscription problems
Performance issues should match other speed/timeout problems
UI bugs should match other interface/display issues
Integration issues should match other integration problems
Custom field issues should match other custom field problems
Workflow issues should match other automation problems
Security issues should match other security problems
Email parsing issues should match other email processing problems
Performance issues should match other speed/performance problems
Mobile app issues should match other mobile problems
Report issues should match other reporting/analytics problems
API issues should match other API-related problems
